Title: The Chorus
Writer: Georges Chaperot, René Wheeler, René Wheeler, Noël-Noël, Christophe Barratier (screen story), Christophe Barratier (screenplay), Philippe Lopes-Curval (screenplay)
Actors: Gérard Jugnot, François Berléand, Kad Merad, Jean-Paul Bonnaire
Plot: The new teacher at a severely administered boys' boarding school works to positively affect the students' lives through music.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 12 wins & 22 nominations.
